name: Signal Bounce
description:
Signal Bounce

v0.1  Apr 14, 2018

Created by Nemoder for the Linux Game Jam 2018:
https://itch.io/jam/linux-game-jam-2018

Requirements:
    libSDL2-2.0.so.0
    libSDL2_image-2.0.so.0
    libSDL2_mixer-2.0.so.0

Objective:    
    Change the waveform's amplitude and phase to move the ball and avoid the angry penguins.
    A point is awarded for each penguin that reaches the left side of the screen.
    100 Bonus points if you hit the snake.
    The more points you have the more angry penguins will appear.
